languages.text: "За твоими словами скрывается истина, мон-кай, которую мне не дано узреть прямо сейчас. Но я обязательно увижу их судьбу во снах. А до тех пор... буду молиться богам о том, чтобы они были благосклонны к мои собратьям".

traits.locale_text: "За твоими словами скрывается истина, мон-кай, которую мне не дано узреть прямо сейчас. Но я обязательно увижу их судьбу во снах. А до тех пор... буду молиться богам о том, чтобы они были благосклонны к мои собратьям".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."
languages.original_text: "За твоими словами скрывается истина, мон-кай, которую мне не дано узреть прямо сейчас. Но я обязательно увижу их судьбу во снах. А до тех пор... буду молиться богам о том, чтобы они были благосклонны к мои собратьям".

traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Hay verdad en tus palabras, mon-keigh; una verdad que ahora mismo no soy capaz de ver. Pero no me cabe duda de que su destino me será revelado en mis sueños. Hasta entonces... rogaré a los dioses que sean benévolos con mi gente».
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."

traits.locale_text: «Hay verdad en tus palabras, mon-keigh; una verdad que ahora mismo no soy capaz de ver. Pero no me cabe duda de que su destino me será revelado en mis sueños. Hasta entonces... rogaré a los dioses que sean benévolos con mi gente».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、お前の言葉の裏には真実がある…今の私には見えぬ真実がな。だが、彼らの運命は私の夢の中で必ず明かされるだろう。それまでは…神々に、私の血族への慈悲を乞うとしよう」
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、お前の言葉の裏には真実がある…今の私には見えぬ真実がな。だが、彼らの運命は私の夢の中で必ず明かされるだろう。それまでは…神々に、私の血族への慈悲を乞うとしよう」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “你的话语背后蕴含着真相，猴子。虽然我现在看不到，但我的梦境会向我揭示他们的命运。在那之前……我祈求诸神善待我的同胞。”
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."

traits.locale_text: “你的话语背后蕴含着真相，猴子。虽然我现在看不到，但我的梦境会向我揭示他们的命运。在那之前……我祈求诸神善待我的同胞。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Il y a une part de vérité dans vos paroles, mon-keigh. Une vérité que je ne peux pas voir maintenant. Mais leur sort m'apparaîtra certainement en rêve. En attendant... J'implorerai les dieux de faire preuve de bienveillance à l'égard de mon peuple. »
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a une part de vérité dans vos paroles, mon-keigh. Une vérité que je ne peux pas voir maintenant. Mais leur sort m'apparaîtra certainement en rêve. En attendant... J'implorerai les dieux de faire preuve de bienveillance à l'égard de mon peuple. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht Wahrheit, Chem-Pan-Sey – eine Wahrheit, die ich im Moment nicht sehen kann. Aber meine Träume werden mir sicher ihr Schicksal offenbaren. Bis dahin ... Ich werde die Götter anflehen, dass sie meiner Art gegenüber gütig sind."
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht Wahrheit, Chem-Pan-Sey – eine Wahrheit, die ich im Moment nicht sehen kann. Aber meine Träume werden mir sicher ihr Schicksal offenbaren. Bis dahin ... Ich werde die Götter anflehen, dass sie meiner Art gegenüber gütig sind."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Söylediklerinin ardında hakikat saklı mon-keigh. Şu anda göremediğim bir hakikat... Ancak düşlerimde muhakkak ki kaderlerini göreceğim. O vakte kadar tanrılardan cömertliklerini soydaşlarımdan esirgememelerini dileyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "There is truth behind your words, mon-keigh — a truth I am unable to see right now. But their fate will certainly be revealed to me in my dreams. Until then... I will beseech the gods for benevolence toward my kin."

traits.locale_text: "Söylediklerinin ardında hakikat saklı mon-keigh. Şu anda göremediğim bir hakikat... Ancak düşlerimde muhakkak ki kaderlerini göreceğim. O vakte kadar tanrılardan cömertliklerini soydaşlarımdan esirgememelerini dileyeceğim."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
